column4: hello, I can ping any ip address in internet, but can't ping any hostname, who can help? in /etc/resolv.conf I have nameserver <IPaddress> where it is verified working dns server
do "nslookup", then "server $ipaddress_of_working_dns_server" then type in a hostname to lookup
thanks, I found out with nslookup that I did not have good address of dns server :) now it is already ok
